files.patch:
@@ -194,6 +194,1 @@
-    $1_CFLAGS := $$(CFLAGS_JDKLIB) $$($1_CFLAGS)
-    ifneq ($$($1_CFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), )
-      $$(foreach flag, $$($1_CFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), \
-        $$(eval $1_CFLAGS := $(filter-out $$(flag), $$($1_CFLAGS)) \
-      ))
-    endif
+    $1_CFLAGS := $$(filter-out $$($1_CFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), $$(CFLAGS_JDKLIB)) $$($1_CFLAGS)
@@ -202,6 +197,1 @@
-    $1_CXXFLAGS := $$(CXXFLAGS_JDKLIB) $$($1_CXXFLAGS)
-    ifneq ($$($1_CXXFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), )
-      $$(foreach flag, $$($1_CXXFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), \
-        $$(eval $1_CXXFLAGS := $(filter-out $$(flag), $$($1_CXXFLAGS)) \
-      ))
-    endif
+    $1_CXXFLAGS := $$(filter-out $$($1_CXXFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), $$(CXXFLAGS_JDKLIB)) $$($1_CXXFLAGS)
@@ -268,6 +258,1 @@
-    $1_CFLAGS := $$(CFLAGS_JDKEXE) $$($1_CFLAGS)
-    ifneq ($$($1_CFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), )
-      $$(foreach flag, $$($1_CFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), \
-        $$(eval $1_CFLAGS := $(filter-out $$(flag), $$($1_CFLAGS)) \
-      ))
-    endif
+    $1_CFLAGS := $$(filter-out $$($1_CFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), $$(CFLAGS_JDKEXE)) $$($1_CFLAGS)
@@ -276,6 +261,1 @@
-    $1_CXXFLAGS := $$(CXXFLAGS_JDKEXE) $$($1_CXXFLAGS)
-    ifneq ($$($1_CXXFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), )
-      $$(foreach flag, $$($1_CXXFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), \
-        $$(eval $1_CXXFLAGS := $(filter-out $$(flag), $$($1_CXXFLAGS)) \
-      ))
-    endif
+    $1_CXXFLAGS := $$(filter-out $$($1_CXXFLAGS_FILTER_OUT), $$(CXXFLAGS_JDKEXE)) $$($1_CXXFLAGS)
